Gutter¶

The gutter module is there for consistent inner spacings of elements. The scaling can be configured via the $gutter variable in blue leaf Core.

SASS¶

@mixin gutter($spacing...)

Adds an inner spacings to the given element. Can savely be applied to Container and Grid elements. Optimized mixins are available for Menu and List, please refer to the respective pages for details.

$spacing

Map or arguments with inner spacings, same as CSS’s padding/margin values (e.g. 1,2,3,4 or 1,2,3 or 1,2 or 1).
